properties.name: connection
properties.description: MongoDB connection configuration to be used by this count operation. Shared configurations use the same MongoDB client.

objectProperties.name: connectionURL
objectProperties.description: The connection URL is a string that a MongoDB driver uses to connect to a database. It can contain information such as where to search for the database, the name of the database to connect to, and configuration properties.

objectProperties.name: username
objectProperties.description: The username to be used to create the MongoDB connection.

objectProperties.name: password
objectProperties.description: The password to be used to create the MongoDB connection.

objectProperties.name: database
objectProperties.description: The database name we want to connect to

properties.name: collection
properties.description: Sets the name of the MongoDB collection to be used for the count operation.

properties.name: connection
properties.description: MongoDB connection configuration to be used by this find operation. Shared configurations use the same MongoDB client.

objectProperties.name: connectionURL
objectProperties.description: The connection URL is a string that a MongoDB driver uses to connect to a database. It can contain information such as where to search for the database, the name of the database to connect to, and configuration properties.

objectProperties.name: username
objectProperties.description: The username to be used to create the MongoDB connection.

objectProperties.name: password
objectProperties.description: The password to be used to create the MongoDB connection.

objectProperties.name: database
objectProperties.description: The database name we want to connect to

properties.name: collection
properties.description: Sets the name of the MongoDB collection to be used for the find operation.

properties.name: filter
properties.example:
• { _id: 5 }
  • { "name.last": "Hopper" }
  • { _id: { $in: [ 5, ObjectId("507c35dd8fada716c89d0013") ] } }
  • { birth: { $gt: new Date('1950-01-01') } }
  • { "name.last": { $regex: /^N/ } }
  • { birth: { $gt: new Date('1920-01-01') }, death: { $exists: false } }
  • context.myFindFilter
properties.description: Sets the filter to be applied to the find operation. If no filter is present all the documents from the given collection will be retrieved.
